participant_1.background:
I'm usually too busy with school work to keep up with my family, but I try my best.
my hobbies are sleeping and playing the guitar.
i am going to school to get my bachelors degree.
I live in a small apartment with my cat Charlie, but I dream of having a house with a big yard so they can run around.
it s great fun.

participant_2.background:
I spend my days designing and sewing my own clothes.
my only friend is a dog.
I got fired from my job for speaking my mind too much.
i hate to workout , but i need to.
I find that reading about the history of the world and its philosophy helps me put my own troubles into perspective.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I design and sew my own clothes.
That's really cool! Do you sell them online?
I do not have an online store, but I have a lot of friends who ask me to make clothes for them.
I'm sure they love them! Do you have a favorite piece of clothing you've ever made?
I have a pair of overalls that I made that I love. I wear them all the time.
I love overalls! I wish I could sew. Do you have any other hobbies?
I don't really have any other hobbies. I like to read about history and philosophy.
That's really interesting! I like to read about history too.
Yeah, I find it really helpful to understand the world around me.
Me too. It's nice to have a different perspective on things.
Yeah, it definitely helps to see things from different angles.
Have you ever thought about starting an online store?
I have thought about it, but I'm not sure if I have the time.
I think you should do it! I bet you'd be really successful.
You should! I'd definitely be a customer
